added.description: AOT library
added.name: AOTLibrary

added.description: Allow VM to run with EXTSHM=ON.
added.name: AllowExtshm

added.description: Globally supress vectorization set in VectorizeMethod
added.name: AllowVectorizeOnDemand

added.description: Accesses to all variables should always be atomic
added.name: AlwaysAtomicAccesses

added.description: Force safe construction, as if all fields are final.
added.name: AlwaysSafeConstructors

added.description: Maximum number of arraycopy elements inlined as a sequence ofloads/stores
added.name: ArrayCopyLoadStoreMaxElem

added.description: Avoid generating unaligned memory accesses
added.name: AvoidUnalignedAccesses

added.description: Bootstrap JVMCI before running Java main method
added.name: BootstrapJVMCI

added.description: be more verbose in compilation timings
added.name: CITimeVerbose

added.description: When a class C is loaded, check that (1) all intrinsics defined by the VM for class C are present in the loaded class file and are marked with the @HotSpotIntrinsicCandidate annotation, that (2) there is an intrinsic registered for all loaded methods that are annotated with the @HotSpotIntrinsicCandidate annotation, and that (3) no orphan methods exist for class C (i.e., methods for which the VM declares an intrinsic but that are not declared in the loaded class C. Check (3) is available only in debug builds.
added.name: CheckIntrinsics

added.description: Factor to control when first compilation happens (both with and without tiered compilation): values greater than 1.0 delay counter overflow, values between 0 and 1.0 rush counter overflow, value of 1.0 leaves compilation thresholds unchanged value of 0.0 is equivalent to -Xint. Flag can be set as per-method option. If a value is specified for a method, compilation thresholds for that method are scaled by both the value of the global flag and the value of the per-method flag.
added.name: CompileThresholdScaling

added.description: Read compiler directives from this file
added.name: CompilerDirectivesFile

added.description: Disable backwards compatibility for compile commands.
added.name: CompilerDirectivesIgnoreCompileCommands

added.description: Limit on number of compiler directives.
added.name: CompilerDirectivesLimit

added.description: Print compiler directives on installation.
added.name: CompilerDirectivesPrint

added.description: Create core/mini dump on VM fatal error
added.name: CreateCoredumpOnCrash

added.description: Power8 or later: DPFD (default prefetch depth) value of the Data Stream Control Register. 0: hardware default, 1: none, 2-7: min-max, 8: don't touch
added.name: DSCR_DPFD_PPC64

added.description: Power8 or later: Specify encoded value for Data Stream Control Register
added.name: DSCR_PPC64

added.description: Power8 or later: URG (depth attainment urgency) value of the Data Stream Control Register. 0: hardware default, 1: none, 2-7: min-max, 8: don't touch
added.name: DSCR_URG_PPC64

added.description: tell sim not to invoke bccheck callback
added.name: DisableBCCheck

added.description: Create reserve copy of graph in SuperWord.
added.name: DoReserveCopyInSuperWord

added.description: Allow tools to load agents with the attach mechanism
added.name: EnableDynamicAgentLoading

added.description: Enable JVMCI
added.name: EnableJVMCI

added.description: Timeout, in seconds, to limit the time spent on writing an error log in case of a crash.
added.name: ErrorLogTimeout

added.description: Whether the JVM is running unit tests or not
added.name: ExecutingUnitTests

added.description: Expand the assembler instruction required to load the base from DecodeN nodes during matching.
added.name: ExpandLoadingBaseDecode

added.description: Expand the assembler instruction required to load the base from DecodeN_NN nodes during matching.
added.name: ExpandLoadingBaseDecode_NN

added.description: Expand the assembler instruction required to load the base from EncodeP nodes during matching.
added.name: ExpandLoadingBaseEncode

added.description: Expand the assembler instruction required to load the base from EncodeP_NN nodes during matching.
added.name: ExpandLoadingBaseEncode_NN

added.description: How many completed time periods from initial mark to first mixed gc are required to use the input values for prediction of the optimal occupancy to start marking.
added.name: G1AdaptiveIHOPNumInitialSamples

added.description: The expected average occupancy of the last PLAB in percent.
added.name: G1LastPLABAverageOccupancy

added.description: Pre-touch large auxiliary data structures used by the GC.
added.name: G1PretouchAuxiliaryMemory

added.description: Adaptively adjust the initiating heap occupancy from the initial value of InitiatingHeapOccupancyPercent. The policy attempts to start marking in time based on application behavior.
added.name: G1UseAdaptiveIHOP

added.description: Guarantee a safepoint (at least) every so many milliseconds (0 means none)
added.name: GuaranteedSafepointInterval

added.description: Heap allocation steps through preferred address regions to find where it can allocate the heap. Number of steps to take per region.
added.name: HeapSearchSteps

added.description: Number of compiled code invocations after which the method is considered as hot by the flusher
added.name: HotMethodDetectionLimit

added.description: Inject thread creation failures for UseDynamicNumberOfGCThreads
added.name: InjectGCWorkerCreationFailure

added.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK11
Expired in JDK12
added.description: intrinsify subset of notify
added.name: InlineNotify

added.description: Reserved size for benchmark counters
added.name: JVMCICounterSize

added.description: Exclude JVMCI compiler threads from benchmark counters
added.name: JVMCICountersExcludeCompiler

added.description: Force number of compiler threads for JVMCI host compiler
added.name: JVMCIHostThreads

added.description: Maximum size of a compiled method.
added.name: JVMCINMethodSizeLimit

added.description: Prints properties used by the JVMCI compiler and exits
added.name: JVMCIPrintProperties

added.description: Force number of JVMCI compiler threads to use
added.name: JVMCIThreads

added.description:
Trace level for JVMCI:
1 means emit a message for each CompilerToVM call,levels greater than 1 provide progressively greater detail
added.name: JVMCITraceLevel

added.description: Use fast inlined locking code
added.name: JVMCIUseFastLocking

added.description: Log methods which have been ever touched in runtime
added.name: LogTouchedMethods

added.description: Threshold above which page-aligned MVCLE copy/init is used.
added.name: MVCLEThreshold

added.description: Maximum expected Data Segment Size.
added.name: MaxExpectedDataSegmentSize

added.description: Number of methods to record in call profile
added.name: MethodProfileWidth

added.description: Minimum number of sweeper passes before an nmethod can be flushed
added.name: MinPassesBeforeFlush

added.description: constant pool is close to instructions
added.name: NearCpool

added.description: tell the AArch64 sim where we are in method code
added.name: NotifySimulator

added.description: Multi versioned post loops to eliminate range checks
added.name: PostLoopMultiversioning

added.description: Per-thread chunk size for parallel memory pre-touch.
added.name: PreTouchParallelChunkSize

added.description: Use LA/LAY instructions over ADD instructions (z/Architecture).
added.name: PreferLAoverADD

added.description: Print used AOT klasses and methods
added.name: PrintAOT

added.description: Print AOT statistics

added.description: Print JVMCI bootstrap progress and summary

added.description: Print more information about deoptimization
added.name: PrintDeoptimizationDetails

added.description: Print VM flags and their ranges and exit VM
added.name: PrintFlagsRanges

added.description: Print ideal graph to XML file / network interface. By default attempts to connect to the visualizer on a socket.
added.name: PrintIdealGraph

added.description: Print a summary statistic for the generated nmethods
added.name: PrintNMethodStatistics

added.description: Print all methods that have been ever touched in runtime
added.name: PrintTouchedMethodsAtExit

added.description: Restrict @ReservedStackAccess to trusted classes
added.name: RestrictReservedStack

added.description: Use a segmented code cache
added.name: SegmentedCodeCache

added.description: Average number of symbols per bucket in shared table
added.name: SharedSymbolTableBucketSize

added.description: When disabled, informs the GC to shrink the java heap directly to the target size at the next full GC rather than requiring smaller steps during multiple full GCs.
added.name: ShrinkHeapInSteps

added.description: Start aggressive sweeping if X[%] of the code cache is free.Segmented code cache: X[%] of the non-profiled heap.Non-segmented code cache: X[%] of the total code cache
added.name: StartAggressiveSweepingAt

added.description: Perform ArrayCopy load/store replacement during IGVN only
added.name: StressArrayCopyMacroNode

added.description: Start with counters compiled in
added.name: StressCodeAging

added.description: Enable reductions support in superword.
added.name: SuperWordReductions

added.description: If > 0, provokes an error inside VM error handler (a secondary crash). see test_error_handler() in debug.cpp.
added.name: TestCrashInErrorHandler

added.description: If true, tests SafeFetch inside error handler.
added.name: TestSafeFetchInErrorHandler

added.description: Back edge threshold at which tier 3 OSR compilation is invoked if coming from AOT
added.name: Tier3AOTBackEdgeThreshold

added.description: Threshold at which tier 3 compilation is invoked (invocation minimum must be satisfied) if coming from AOT
added.name: Tier3AOTCompileThreshold

added.description: Compile if number of method invocations crosses this threshold if coming from AOT
added.name: Tier3AOTInvocationThreshold

added.description: Minimum invocation to compile at tier 3 if coming from AOT
added.name: Tier3AOTMinInvocationThreshold

added.description: Trace accumulated time for old collection
added.name: TraceOldGenTime

added.description: Trace what Superword Level Parallelism analysis applies
added.name: TraceSuperWordLoopUnrollAnalysis

added.description: Print message when a failed speculation was not collected
added.name: TraceUncollectedSpeculations

added.description: Trace accumulated time for young collection
added.name: TraceYoungGenTime

added.description: Use 64K pages if available.
added.name: Use64KPages

added.description: 4K/64K page allocation threshold.
added.name: Use64KPagesThreshold

added.description: Use intrinsics for the paralleled version of AES/CTR crypto
added.name: UseAESCTRIntrinsics

added.description: Use AOT compiled files
added.name: UseAOT

added.description: Exit the VM if any of the AOT libraries has invalid config
added.name: UseAOTStrictLoading

added.description: use intrinsics for java.util.zip.Adler32
added.name: UseAdler32Intrinsics

added.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK15
Expired in JDK16
added.description: Use memory barriers to implement volatile accesses
added.name: UseBarriersForVolatile

added.description: Use byte reverse instruction.
added.name: UseByteReverseInstruction

added.description: Use CMove (scalar and vector) ignoring profitability test.
added.name: UseCMoveUnconditionally

added.description: Use CRC32 instructions for CRC32 computation

added.name: UseCRC32CIntrinsics

added.description: Insert counter to detect warm methods
added.name: UseCodeAging

added.description: Use CPU_ALLOC code path in os::active_processor_count
added.name: UseCpuAllocPath

added.description: Explicit commit for virtual memory.
added.name: UseExplicitCommit

added.description: Control whether FMA instructions are used when available

added.description: Use intrinsics for GHASH versions of crypto

added.description: Use JVMCI as the default compiler
added.name: UseJVMCICompiler

added.description: Use LSE instructions

added.name: UseLibmIntrinsic

added.description: Use Neon for CRC32 computation

added.deprecation:

added.name: UseSemaphoreGCThreadsSynchronization

added.description: tell sim to cache memory updates until exclusive op occurs

added.description: Use unaligned memory accesses in Unsafe
added.name: UseUnalignedAccesses

added.name: UseVectorizedMismatchIntrinsic

added.description: Verify code cache on memory allocation/deallocation

added.name: ZapHighNonSignificantBits

removed.name: Use486InstrsOnly

removed.description: Use alternate signals instead of SIGUSR1 & SIGUSR2 for VM internal signals (Solaris only)
removed.name: UseAltSigs

removed.description: Use Asynchronous Concurrent Mark-Sweep GC in the old generation
removed.name: UseAsyncConcMarkSweepGC

removed.description: Bind user level threads to kernel threads (for Solaris only)
removed.name: UseBoundThreads

removed.description: Use adaptive free lists in the CMS generation
removed.name: UseCMSAdaptiveFreeLists

removed.description: Use passing of collection from background to foreground
removed.name: UseCMSCollectionPassing

removed.description: Use Mark-Sweep-Compact algorithm at full collections
removed.name: UseCMSCompactAtFullCollection

removed.description: Stop at safepoints in compiled code
removed.name: UseCompilerSafepoints

removed.description: Rotate gclog files (for long running applications). It requires -Xloggc:<filename>
removed.name: UseGCLogFileRotation

removed.description: (Unstable) uses memset in BOT updates in GC code
removed.name: UseMemSetInBOT

removed.description: Temporary flag for transition to reflection based on dynamic bytecode generation in 1.4; can no longer be turned off in 1.4 JDK, and is unneeded in 1.3 JDK, but marks most places VM changes were needed
removed.name: UseNewReflection

removed.description: Enable the 1.3 inlining strategy
removed.name: UseOldInlining

removed.description: (Unstable, Solaris-specific) Thread interrupt before or with EINTR for I/O operations results in OS_INTRPT. The default value of this flag is true for JDK 6 and earlier
removed.name: UseVMInterruptibleIO

removed.description: Display detailed verification details
removed.name: VerboseVerification

removed.description: Verify compiled-code cache often
removed.name: VerifyCodeCacheOften

removed.description: Abort VM on erroneous or inconsistent generic signatures
removed.name: VerifyGenericSignatures

removed.description: Force verification of 1.4 reflection bytecodes. Does not work in situations like that described in 4486457 or for constructors generated for serialization, so can not be enabled in product.
removed.name: VerifyReflectionBytecodes

removed.description: Do not print the verification progress
removed.name: VerifySilently

removed.description: (Unstable, Linux-specific) avoid NPTL-FUTEX hang pthread_cond_timedwait
removed.name: WorkAroundNPTLTimedWaitHang

removed.description: Zap dead locals in compiler frames
removed.name: ZapDeadCompiledLocals

removed.description: If +ZapDeadCompiledLocals, skip this many before really doing it
removed.name: ZapDeadCompiledLocalsFirst

removed.description: If +ZapDeadCompiledLocals, do this many after skipping (incl. skip count, -1 = all)
removed.name: ZapDeadCompiledLocalsLast

removed.description: Zap dead locals (old version, zaps all frames when entering the VM
removed.name: ZapDeadLocalsOld
